alert.note: Alert for Bath; Menifee; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 12:47PM EDT until July 28 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bath County in east central Kentucky... Northern Menifee County in east central Kentucky... Southwestern Rowan County in east central Kentucky... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1247 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bourbon Furnace, or over Owingsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Polksville around 1255 PM EDT. Salt Lick around 100 PM EDT. Young Springs around 105 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Yale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
